data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Parawenhoekia (Acari: Chyzeriidae) from Montenegro

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Saboori, Alireza, Pesic, Vladimir, Hakimitabar, Masoud (2008): A new species of the genus Parawenhoekia (Acari: Chyzeriidae) from Montenegro. Zootaxa 1756: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181806
